display_long_description:
# 🏍 Off Track VR – Ride. Stunt. Explore. Together.

Welcome to Off Track VR, a physics-based sandbox for bike lovers, tricksters, and explorers in VR.

This early prototype focuses on core gameplay: smooth riding, stunt-ready bikes, and varied terrain to test your skill and flow. No fluff, just pure riding freedom.

Now featuring multiplayer and in-game voice chat, you can ride, stunt, or chill with friends across open maps made for creativity and flow.

🛞 Current Features
🚲 6 Free Rideable Bikes

- 🏍 Dirt Bike – light and responsive
- 🧗‍♂️ Trial Bike – precision and balance
- 🔥 Super Moto – fast and grippy
- 🛵 Scooter – playful and smooth
- 🧭 Adventure Bike – built for distance
- 🛻 ATV (4-Wheeler) – all-terrain fun

🔥 Also available the Off Track Pro Line with 5 new bikes and exclusive skins.

🌍 4 Open Maps

Ride freely across varied terrain and discover your flow:

🌲 Forest Track – smooth curves and dirt trails
🛞 Dirt Bike Track – jumps, loops, and tight turns
🏔 Mountain Roads – scenic routes with light AI traffic
🌀 Ramps & Tunnels – a playground for creativity and tricks

Discover the physics, enjoy the terrain, and just ride.

🎯 What's Coming Next
This is just the beginning. We're building Off Track VR into a full sandbox riding experience with:

🤸 Tricks & Stunts System
🎨 Bike Skins & Customization
🏁 Races & Time Challenges
🧍‍♂️ Full-Body Player Avatars
🛠 New Vehicles & Bikes
